circumstances: On final approach to Barrow, an engine failed. The crew reduced his altitude and attempted an emergency landing. The airplane crash landed and slid for dozen yards before coming to rest few hundred yards short of runway threshold. All 10 occupants evacuated safely while the aircraft was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause:
Engine failure on final approach. The following factors and findings were reported: 
- Improper maintenance on part of the maintenance personnel, 
- Anti-icing, de-icing system,
- Icing conditions including sleet and freezing rain, 
- Engine icing,
- The crew failed to use or incorrectly used the miscellaneous equipment, 
- Ice on propeller, 
- Airframe ice, 
- Complete engine failure, 
- Hot air lines to intake air duct loose.
